title: 2018 voters to rely on vulnerable ballot machines
text:
2018 voters to rely on vulnerable ballot machines 11:15am BST - 02:03
Many voters in this year's midterm elections will rely on old voting machines that cannot fully be checked for hacking or manipulation, raising concerns not just of meddling but of a collapse in voter confidence.
Many voters in this year's midterm elections will rely on old voting machines that cannot fully be checked for hacking or manipulation, raising concerns not just of meddling but of a collapse in voter confidence. //reut.rs/2IZ5rP8
